requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 256MB Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon HD 2400 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 32-bit 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 256MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
